main event: A witness observed a bright light in the sky over Dyke, Virginia, on July 1, 1967.
interesting points: The object appeared to be a bright light compared to that of a star., The witness observed the object for 1 minute flying from SW to NE., The object's edges were described as fuzzy and blurred., The object was reported to be silent with no physical evidence., The witness had never seen a similar object before.
witness description: The observer is a 27-year-old female, noted that her husband, who has experience with aviation, was also present during the sighting.
